name: Brian's Soccer Simulator
description:
Brian's Soccer Simulator allows you to quickly and easily create, simulate and review soccer teams and leagues in a text-based game. Simulate years of results in minutes or hours instead of weeks or months.

  • Build custom leagues with up to 24 custom or preexisting teams
  • Includes options for promotion/relegation as well as natural player retirement and replacement
  • Statistics tracking: view the full league table, schedule and results, leader boards, individual team stats, all past league winners, all-time stats and more!

The game comes loaded with 3 leagues and 55 teams.
